attributes.action: Stop local authorities charging small busineses for collection of recyclable refuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local authorities charge small busineses non domestic council tax as well extra for refuse collection.If the refuse could be recycled 1)councils will make money by selling refuse on.(2)less of a burden on small buisineses in these financially dificult times. Most recycling centers will not accept recycling materials from small busineses.
